description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Nuestro Siglo. Reseña histórica de los más importantes acontecimientos sociales, artísticos, científicos é industriales de nuestra época ... Traduccion del aleman, revisada  anotada por Don M. Menendez Pelayo ... Edicion profusamente ilustrada" Author: LEIXNER, Otto von. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9006.i.5." Page: 303 Place of Publishing: Barcelona Date of Publishing: 1883 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002124749 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
